description: This file defines a dependency function 'get_current_user' for FastAPI that retrieves the currently authenticated user based on Bearer JWT token, handling token decoding, validation, and user lookup in the database.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Database model representing a user in the system.

methods.name: User get_current_user( creds: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(bearer_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: FastAPI dependency that retrieves the authenticated user from the JWT token present in the request headers.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.signature: ( creds: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(bearer_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
